inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of uncomplicated interdigital Tinea pedis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: co-operative, reliable and sufficiently competent to grade and record symptoms as requested
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: post-menopausal or surgically sterile, abstinent, or, if sexually active, practicing an effective method of birth control
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous sensitivity to imidazole antifungal agents
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of disallowed therapies including oral (by mouth) antifungal treatments within the previous 6 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a clinical diagnosis of uncomplicated interdigital Tinea pedis confirmed by KOH microscopy. He smokes and drinks, but no other risk factors mentioned.
